name: Flybe Full Flight | Glasgow to Barra | Viking Twin Otter (with ATC, Beach Landing)
description:
A full length, full flight video from Glasgow to Barra with Flybe (Loganair) onboard Viking DHC6 Twin Otter G-HIAL operating flight BE6851.

**Every moment of the flight from outside the airport to Glasgow to landing on the beach at Barra.  ATC for departure from Glasgow**

***This video is a combination of my own departure from Glasgow and the remainder of the flight courtesy of SierraRomeoTango - Check out his channel at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsEewoODs2zloZ1Ph-8JYfA

PLEASE SUBSCRIBE FOR WEEKLY FULL FLIGHTSBECOME AN INFLIGHT VIDEO VIP AT http://patreon.com/inflightvideo

PATREON: http://patreon.com/inflightvideo
MY CAMERA GEAR: https://www.amazon.com/shop/inflightvideo
Airline:  Flybe (operated by Loganair)
Flight:  BE6851 (callsign 'Logan 86BX')
Aircraft:  Viking DHC6 Twin Otter G-HIAL
From:  Glasgow (GLA)
To:  Barra (BRR)
Seat:  6C/3C

Our flight today begins outside the terminal at Glasgow Airport.  We enter the terminal and head through security, before heading to the Loganair gates.

Before long we are called to board and make our way out to today's ride - Viking Twin Otter G-HIAL.  We board and take our seat in row 6 on this tiny aircraft.  We soon get ATC clearance to power back and taxi to runway 23, where we make a powerful departure towards the west climbing out over the River Clyde.  Glasgow Departure clears us to our cruising altitude of 6,000ft and we head towards the Scottish coast.  We are soon over the sea and commence our unique approach into Barra, swinging round over the island and touching down smoothly on the sandy beach, splashing through giant pools of water before we come to a halt and shut down the engines.
#inflightVideo #FullFlight #FullFlightVideo
